description: This is a CMake script defining a function GetExternalCode that automates retrieving external code dependencies from a Git repository during the configuration phase. It includes argument parsing, repository detection, cloning, checkout, and error handling logic.

methods.name: GetExternalCode
methods.description: Defines a CMake function that clones a Git repository and checks out a specific version if provided, handling local or remote repositories and optional force clearing of existing sources.
